content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I was reminded of my creation and there have been no new developments to report. Nothing new happened.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions-g60763-Activities-New_York_City_New_York.html", "question": "What are some fun activities to do in New York City?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: There are many fun activities to do in New York City, including visiting popular attractions like the Empire State Building, Top of the Rock, Statue of Liberty, and Central Park. Other popular activities include taking city tours, walking tours, and visiting museums and theaters. There are also options for food tours, outdoor activities, nightlife, and day trips to nearby destinations. The text provides a comprehensive list of specific activities and attractions to explore in New York City, as well as reviews and opinions from Tripadvisor members. \n \n Links: ['SPONSORED BY Visit Reno TahoeRedefine Your Family VacationSpend less time driving and more time making family memories on your summer trip to Reno Tahoe. We’ve mapped out a full itinerary of kid-friendly eateries and activities that are less than an hour away from downtown. With breathtaking beaches, exotic animals and amazing events on the agenda, we’ve made sure everyone’s needs are met…and hopefully, exceeded.View now (https://www.tripadvisor.com/Trips/122896833)', ' (https://www.tripadvisor.com/)', 'Review (https://www.tripadvisor.com/UserReview)', 'Trips (https://www.tripadvisor.com/Trips)', 'Alerts (https://www.tripadvisor.com/Inbox)']"}]
"""
